andromeda.why: Holding the tongue for quality is personal discipline, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Regulates pace and gate of expression—container-first speech hygiene.

draco.why: Early ‘right speech’ anxiety can slip into correctness/status policing.

lyra.why: This line is about restraint more than artistic display.

orion-dark.why: Using silence as control/doctrine rather than discernment.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal: courage to wait until the expression is true.

pleiades.why: Attunes to mood/audience so speech can be received rather than resisted.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching restraint; no transmission of law yet.

arcturus.why: Keeps a clean timing container so words land.

draco.why: Fear of judgment can provoke ‘prove-it’ or rank-guarding.

lyra.why: When the mood is right, expression is stylistically potent.

orion-dark.why: Hiding behind formulaic phrases for safety.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: speak only when aligned and ready.

pleiades.why: Social attunement and hospitality shape when/how to speak.

sirius.why: Practical pacing of voice, not formal instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Vulnerability in speech is self-mastery work, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Timing dysregulation: speaking too soon or clamping down from anxiety.

draco.why: Critique can trigger defensive posturing/gatekeeping of ‘correct speech’.

lyra.why: Creative confession—raw, emotive expression when the wave crests.

orion-dark.why: Leaning on canned rhetoric to avoid exposure.

orion-light.why: Trial of timing: integrity to own mistakes and refine voice.

pleiades.why: Attunes to safety/holding so truth can be spoken without harm.

sirius.why: Self-forging voice; no teaching transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Socializing expression is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Translates timing and tone into shareable norms for conversation.

draco.why: Success can attract clique filters on who ‘gets a voice.’

lyra.why: Refined, charismatic delivery—cultural beacon of style and tone.

orion-dark.why: Risk of turning style into doctrine or gatekeeping.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-steadiness: others meet the ordeal of speaking with integrity.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing and hospitality make the message receivable.

sirius.why: Voice-as-teaching: timing and tone themselves transmit higher order.

andromeda.why: Refuses coerced narratives; guards speech sovereignty under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix the room with your words’ → burnout/scapegoat pattern.

draco.why: Authority aura invites loyalty tests and correctness policing.

lyra.why: Iconic voice becomes a cultural signal of taste and tone.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing speech norms to preserve image/control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—say what’s true, not what flatters.

pleiades.why: Appeasement/people-pleasing can warp authentic timing and tone.

sirius.why: Royal instruction-by-presence: demonstrates clean speech under pressure.

andromeda.why: Refuses coercion; speech or silence stays self-sovereign.

arcturus.why: Elder pacing of voice—durable standards for when and how to speak.

draco.why: Legacy authority can slide into status/correctness policing.

lyra.why: Role-model style—beauty and restraint in expression.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: disciplined courage to use (or withhold) the voice impeccably.

pleiades.why: Focus is integrity and timing, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Voice sage—teaches the law of right speech by embodied example.
